dct_title_s: Political map of India / published under the direction of Lt. General Girish Kumar, VSM Surveyor General of India.
dct_description_sm: Map shows international, state, district, and territory boundaries; principal railways and main roads. Includes index to Union territories and selected districts.
dct_publisher_sm: Dehra Dun : Survey of India : Department of Science and Technology, Government of India, 2019.
